# checking data types

```{r}
## 1
vec_1 <- c(2, 5, 9, 10, 12, 1, 0)
vec_1
class(vec_1)
typeof(vec_1)

vec_1_e3 <- vec_1[3]
vec_1_e3
vec_1_e1 <- vec_1[1]
vec_1_e1
vec_1_e5to7 <- vec_1[5:7]
vec_1_e5to7

vec_1_char <-as.character(vec_1)

## 2 
vec_2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara", 
           location = "Rincon", 
           swell = "south")
vec_2
class(vec_2)
length(vec_2)
vec_2_e2 <- vec_2[2]
vec_2_e2

#3 
df_1 <- data.frame(region = LETTERS[1:4], 
                   species = c("otter", "great white", "sea lion", "gray whale"), 
                   count = c(12, 2, 36, 6))
df_1
class(df_1)
class(df_1$species)
max_count <- max(df_1$count)
```
